component.name: Universal Blue Image Manager
component.summary: Modern GUI for managing Universal Blue custom images

description.p: Universal Blue Image Manager provides a modern libadwaita-compliant interface for managing Universal Blue custom images. Following Universal Blue development best practices, it provides guidance and information rather than direct system modifications.

ul.li: Visual system status monitoring with real rpm-ostree integration
Guidance-based rebase operations following UB patterns
Modern libadwaita interface with adaptive design
Support for all Universal Blue image variants
